dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: Cifar10 is an image recognition dataset consisting of 60000 32 × 32 tiny RGB natural images, distributed over 10 classes with 6000 images per class.
dcterms:title: Cifar10

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: Cifar100 is an image recognition dataset consisting of 60000 32 × 32 tiny RGB natural images, distributed over 100 classes with 600 images per class.
dcterms:title: Cifar100

dcterms:creator: G. Griffin
A. Holub
P. Perona
dcterms:description: Caltech256 is an image recognition dataset consisting of 31000 RGB images divided into 256 classes, with five different random splits of 50 train images and 20 testing images for each class.
dcterms:title: Caltech256

dcterms:creator: K. Soomro
A. R. Zamir
M. Shah
dcterms:description: UCF101 is a video action recognition dataset consisting of 13320 action videos belonging to 101 action classes, from which two million frames are sampled.
dcterms:title: UCF101
